scripts.build: pnpm --filter @hive/core build && pnpm --filter @hive/validation build && pnpm --filter @hive/auth-logic build && pnpm --filter @hive/analytics build && pnpm --filter @hive/ui build
scripts.lint: cross-env BROWSERSLIST_IGNORE_OLD_DATA=1 BROWSERSLIST_UPDATE_DB=0 NO_UPDATE_NOTIFIER=1 TURBO_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 CI=1 turbo run lint
scripts.check-quality: pnpm lint && pnpm typecheck && pnpm analyze-code && pnpm test
